text: During his time in the Senate, he served as the Chair of the Senate Intelligence Committee.
During his time in the Senate, he served as the Chair of the[[United States Senate Select Committee on Intelligence|Senate Intelligence Committee]].
During his time in the Senate, he served as the Chair of the Foreign Relations Committee.

During his nearly 4 decades in the Senate, he has served as the Chair of the Senate Finance Committee, the Chair of the Senate Narcotics Committee, the Chair of the Senate Judiciary Committee, and the Chair of the Senate Aging Committee.
